invocations.description: Returns the amount of monsters found in the range distance, excluding creature names found in the list. Optionally you can add a function to filter those creatures.
invocations.ex:
if maroundfilterignore(1, false, 'Tarantula', function(cre) return cre.hppc <= 50 end) >= 3 then
	cast('exori gran')
end
invocations.exDescription: Will cast exori gran if there's more than 3 creatures with health percent below 50, excluding Tarantulas.
